text: @GregAbbott_TX Fact Check: Texas hit 3rd straight day of more than 1,000 new coronavirus cases Sat as the state re-opened the economy. Officials reported 1,293 new cases, the 2nd-highest single-day infection rate, marking the 1st time Texas has recorded more than 1,000 three days in a row.
